025package com.github.siroshun09.event4j.listener;
026
027import org.jetbrains.annotations.Contract;
028import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
029
030import java.util.function.Consumer;
031
032/**
033 * An interface to create/subscribe a listener.
034 *
035 * @param <K> the key type
036 * @param <E> the event type
037 * @param <O> the order type
038 */
039public interface ListenerFactory<K, E, O> {
040
041    /**
042     * Sets the key.
043     *
044     * @param key the key
045     * @return this {@link ListenerFactory}
046     */
047    @Contract("_ -> this")
048    @NotNull ListenerFactory<K, E, O> key(K key);
049
050    /**
051     * Sets the {@link Consumer}
052     *
053     * @param consumer the {@link Consumer}
054     * @return this {@link ListenerFactory}
055     */
056    @Contract("_ -> this")
057    @NotNull ListenerFactory<K, E, O> consumer(Consumer<? super E> consumer);
058
059    /**
060     * Sets the order
061     *
062     * @param order the order
063     * @return this {@link ListenerFactory}
064     */
065    @Contract("_ -> this")
066    @NotNull ListenerFactory<K, E, O> order(O order);
067
068    /**
069     * Subscribes a listener.
070     *
071     * @return a {@link SubscribedListener}
072     */
073    @Contract(" -> new")
074    @NotNull SubscribedListener<K, E, O> subscribe();
075
076}
